name: Everyday Yoga
description: A practical guide to practicing yoga for active people, from beginners to yoga teachers. Each  routine moves the spine in every direction and loosens tight hips. Routines from 5 to 50 minutes will leave you satisfied and relaxed. By sequencing several routines together, you can build a stronger, more flexible, injury-resistant body. The author is a leading expert on yoga for active people.  The guide is designed to lie flat for easy reference.
